required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Geriatric Head Trauma Short Term Outcomes Project
clinical_study.official_title: Geriatric Head Trauma Short Term Outcomes Project

brief_summary.textblock: This prospective observational study will examine the incidence of intracranial hemorrhage. The investigators will compare patients on anticoagulant and/or antiplatelet therapy with head trauma compared to patients not on these medications. While many studies have sought to quantify the incidence of intracranial hemorrhage in these patients, there is considerable controversy regarding their care and what to do after an initial negative head CT in anticoagulated geriatric patients who have experienced head trauma.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with 14 Day ED Returns
primary_outcome.description: Return visit to ED within 2 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Primary Intracranial Hemorrhage
primary_outcome.description: ICH on initial head CT scan

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Delayed Intracranial Hemorrhage
Number of Participants with Hospitalizations at 14 days
primary_outcome.description: If patient is admitted for any reason after initial ED visit
Death of patient from any cause at primary visit or up to 60 days from follow-up

secondary_outcome.description: Descriptive information from telephone interviews about how patients changed activities after head trauma
Additional therapies or intervention instituted after minor head trauma

study_pop.textblock: The Delray Medical Center and St. Mary's Medical Center emergency departments will be the major focal points for the study. These medical centers are located in Palm Beach County, Florida. Florida has the highest percentage of geriatric patients in the United States and, in particular, Palm Beach County has over 250,000 residents over the age of 65.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: Patients seen in the emergency department for head trauma
Exclusion Criteria: Penetrating head trauma
